name: Game Design for Beginners
description:
Game Design for Beginners is an ironic game about the life of the typical indie developer and his best but imaginary friend, the Bee-man. Together with them, you have to go through all the stages of the development of a video game, as well as all the stages of accepting depression. The video game is an almanac of mini-games, the pool of which will be replenished in the future along with the plot. Thank you for your ratings and reviews, enjoy the game!

This version of the game features 3 chapters of the "story" mode, more than 20 different mini-games, as well as the "infinity" mode, in which you have to test your reactions and skills!
Some mini-games, visual style, as well as your best friend, the Bee-Man, you can see in the screenshots. The game is available for download on android, as well as in the browser.
